name: Bionomy of macrobenthic amphipods, molluscs and polychaetes in the Evros Delta, September 1981
description: The composition and distribution of the macrobenthic amphipod, mollusc and polychaete fauna in theEvros Delta have been investigated. The distribution of species showed a zonation mainly related to thedegree of "confinement".
